title: Sport. [Ep. 2/73]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items covering various sports in Germany including: 1. Horse teams of four in hand. 2. Testing synthetic running shoes and sy;nthetic ski runs. 3. Stock car racing. 4. Combination flying machine and boat. 5. Breeding race horses.
